3675.「ぴゃ～っ！ 今日も おっもしろいね～！！\n 次の出し物 何かな～？:
Woooow～!
The circus is always so much fun～!!
What d'ya think they'll do next～?

3676.「空中ブランコに つなわたりに\n ピエロも 出ただろ……？\n ええと……まあ:
Maybe they'll bring out a trapeze artist, or a
clown...? Hmm...
Guess we'll just have to wait and see.

3677.「そっかあ！ そうだよね！\n 今日は サイコーの日だよっ。:
Yeah, guess so!
Today's the best day ever.

3678.「なんだよ フッタ！\n 弟のくせに ぼくが言いたかったこと\n 先に言うなよ！:
What the heck, Footer?!
Little brother or not, don't go stealing my
line!!

3680.「……でもさあ にいちゃん。\n ホントに 今日のサーカスって タダなの？\n:
...But, Hippel.
Can a circus this fun really be free?

3681.「ああ。サーカスが始まって １５周年だから\n 記念に 子供はみんな タダなんだ:
Sure is. Captain Nablette said they're letting
all the kids in free to celebrate their 15th
anniversary.

3682.「……ほんとだ。\n オルフェア中の子供が 見にきてる。:
...You're right.
Kids from all over town are here.

3683.「しかも サーカスの後は\n 特製アクロバットケーキ 食べ放題だぜ！\n 団長さ:
Plus, they said that after the circus, we can all have as much of their special Acrobatic Cake as we can eat～
The Captain's really treating us. He's the best.

3684.「しーっ！ \n 次の出し物が 始まるわよ！:
Shh!
The next act's about to start!

3687.「本日は 当 ナブナブ大サーカス団の\n １５周年を祝う 特別なショーへ\n ご:
Thank you all for coming to today's special
show, celebrating the 15th anniversary of the
Grand Nab-Nab Circus.

3688.「よっ！ 待ってました！！\n オルフェア町長っ！\n いや ナブナブ大サーカス:
Woo-hoo! We've been waiting for this, mayor!
Or should I say, "leader of the Grand Nab-Nab
Circus"?!

3690.「本日 最後にお見せする この奇術は\n １５年目の この日に ふさわしい\n:
The last trick I'm going to show you today is
the greatest of them all; a trick befitting of
this 15th anniversary.

3692.「このサーカスを 観ている\n オルフェア中の子供たちを……:
The children from all over Orphea, watching
this circus...

3693.「いっしゅんにして！: In the blink of an eye...!

3700.「だいじょうぶだよ フッタ。\n すぐに 明るく……:
It's alright, Footer.
The lights'll come back on soon...

3703.「すばらしい！ 見事に 子供を消し去るとは\n さすがは ナブナブ大サーカス団！:
Good show! Making all the kiddies vanish
without a trace, what a splendid trick!!
I'm quite impressed!

3704.「……さりとて ナブレット団長どのの姿まで\n 見えぬとは 面妖な。:
...However, I do find it odd that Captain
Nablette has yet to make his reappearance.

3706.「おいおい どうなってるんだよ？: Whoa, hold on, what's going on here?

3710.「当 ナブナブ大サーカス団の\n １５周年を記念する 最後の大奇術。\n お楽し:
This concludes the 15th anniversary of the
Grand Nab-Nab Circus. I hope you all enjoyed
yourselves.

3711.「残念ながら オルフェアの子供たちは\n もう 戻っては きません。:
Unfortunately, the children of Orphea will not
be coming back.

3712.「ちょっと！？ どういうこと！？: Hold on! What do you mean?!

3713.「いやいや そんなに あわてなくても\n 子供たちは すぐに出てきますよ。:
No, no, don't panic.
I'm sure the kids will come out soon.

3714.「……いいえ。子供たちは 今日かぎり\n オルフェアの町から 消え去るのです！:
...Wrong. As of today, all the children will
vanish from this town of Orphea!

3715.「おいっ！！ ふざけるな！！: Hey! You've gotta be kidding me!

3722.「苦節３０年！！ ワガハイこと パクレ警部の\n 優秀な頭脳を オルフェア中に知:
After thirty years of hard work!!
At last, a chance to show all of Orphea the
brilliant mind of Inspector Pakul, a.k.a. me!

3724.「たった今 オルフェア中の子供たちが\n ナブレット団長に さらわれてしまいまし:
Just now, all the children in Orphea were
kidnapped by Captain Nablette!

3726.「このパクレ警部が かならずや！\n 子供たちを 取り戻してみせますぞ！！:
Inspector Pakul is on the case!
I will bring your children back!!

3727.「おのれ！ 悪漢ナブレット！！\n 待て待て待てぇ～い！！:
Nablette, you rat! You fiend!!
Just wait 'til I get my hands on youuuuu!!

3728.「……他の連中の目は ごまかせても\n ワガハイの目は ごまかせんぞ！:
...You may have fooled everyone else, but you
can't fool my eyes!

3729.「ナブナブ大サーカス団長にして\n オルフェア町長とは 世をしのぶ仮の姿！\n:
His role as the head of the Grand Nab-Nab
Circus and the mayor of Orphea was all just a
ruse! His true identity is...

3730.「世紀の悪漢 ナブレット！！\n ヤツは オルフェアの子供たちを さらった\n:
Nablette, the villain of the century!! The
very same thug who kidnapped the children of
Orphea! It's him for sure!

3731.「隠しだてすると 貴様らも 共犯とみなすぞ！\n さあ 吐け！ 吐くのだ！！\n:
If you try to hide it from me I'll consider you an accomplice! Come on, tell me what you know! Spit it out!
Where did that rascally Nablette abscond to?

3733.「であるから その 消えた団長の行き先を\n 教えろと言っているのだっ！！: That's why I'm asking you where he went!!

3734.「そうよ 団長は 奇術で消えちゃったの。\n もう どこにもいないわ。\n オル:
He's right, the Captain vanished with a magic
trick. He's nowhere to be found, and so are
the children of Orphea.

3735.「フザケたことを ぬかすなであるっ！！\n 貴様ら 全員 タイホだーっ！！:
DON'T PLAY DUMB WITH ME!!
YOU'RE ALL UNDER ARREEEEEEST!!

3738.「おお。子供ではないか！\n 悪漢ナブレットから 逃げてきたのだな！:
Oh, you're a child!
You must have escaped from the dastardly
Nablette!

3739.「ちがうよ！ ぼくは さらわれてないよ！\n それに……ナブレット団長は\n 子:
You've got it all wrong! I wasn't kidnapped!
And... Captain Nablette isn't the type
of person who would kidnap a child!!

3740.「団長さんは この町の しんせきに引き取られた\n ぼくを 団員にしてくれた。い:
The Captain took me in as a member of the
troupe and treated me like family! He's a good
man! This has to be some kind of mistake!

3741.「貴様 なにゆえ\n そこまで 悪漢ナブレットを\n かばおうとするのであるか…:
Why are you so eager to protect that
scoundrel...?

3743.「さては 貴様も共犯だな！？: So you're an accomplice, are you?!

3744.「子供だからと言って ようしゃはせんのだ！\n 悪漢ナブレットの居場所を 白状す:
Just because you're a child doesn't mean you
can't be guilty! I'll interrogate you until
you reveal that fiend's whereabouts!

3746.「団長っ！ いつのまに！？: Captain! When did you get here?!

3747.「プディン。よその町から来た おめえも\n 今じゃあ すっかり オルフェアの子供:
Pudin. You came from out of town, but you're a
child of Orphea now. This would all be
pointless if I forgot you.

3749.「今度こそ オルフェアの子供は\n 全員 さらったぞっ！: Now I've taken every child in Orphea!

3752.「一度ならず 二度までも\n ワガハイの目の前で 子供をさらうとは……。\n 悪:
To kidnap a child right in front of me, not
once, but twice...
YOU SCALLYWAG!!

3753.「待て待て待てぇーい！！: Wait 'til I get my hands on youuuu!!

3755.「へえ……あんた プディンの知り合いの\n 演芸チャンピオンかい！:
Wow...so you're a Goofball Grand Prix
champion who knows Pudin!

3756.「そうか そうか……。\n あんたのギャグの数々 プディンから\n よーく 聞い:
I see, I see... I've heard so many of
your jokes from Puddin. Pukukuku!

3757.「しかし……そうか。\n 知り合いなら プディンのこと心配だよな。\n ………そ:
...I understand now.
If you know Pudin, then you must be worried
about him, right? That much is plain.

3758.「ふうん……<pc>って 言うのか。\n キーエンブレムを求めて 来たのかい？:
Hmm...your name's <pc>, you say?
Have you come for the Key Emblem?

3759.「なら タイミングが悪かったな。\n 今 行っちまった ナブレット団長が\n こ:
Well, now's not a good time.
Orphea's mayor, Captain Nablette, has
disappeared.

3760.「町長が いないんじゃ\n キーエンブレムは もらえないだろ？:
Can't very well receive the Key Emblem if the
mayor's not here, can you?

3761.「……ナブレット団長が 行きそうな場所に\n 心当たりが ないわけじゃない。:
...Well, that's not to say that I don't have
an idea of where the Captain may have gone.

3762.「オルフェア地方西から 南へ行くと\n リンクル地方に出る。そこを さらに南に進:
If you go south from Orphea Region West, you'll reach the Wrinkle Region. If you go further south from there, you'll come to a
place called Silver Hill.

3763.「ちょっと ハカル！？\n こんな どこの馬の骨とも わからないヤツに\n 教え:
Hold on a second, Hakal!
Is it really okay to tell some random stranger
about this?!

3764.「ナブレット団長が言ってた 例の旅人ってのは\n もしかしたら こいつかもしれな:
This could be the traveler that Captain
Nablette was talking about. ...I've got a gut
feeling that they're the one.

3766.「団長は おそらく 銀の丘だ。\n <pc>。気をつけてな。:
The Captain is probably at Silver Hill.
Watch yourself out there, <pc>.

3767.「やだよう！ うちに 帰してよう！: Cut it out! Let us go home!

3768.「そうだ！ ナブレット団長！！\n ぼくたちを どうするつもりだ！？:
Yeah!! What are you planning to do with us,
Captain Nablette?!

3770.「おめえらを 家に帰すわけには\n いかねえんだよ。: I can't let you go home.

3772.「なっ なんだよ！？ ここ！\n どうなってるんだ！？:
Wh-what is this place?!
What's going on?!

3775.「おめえも もう オルフェアの子供だ！\n さっさと この扉の中へ 入るんだよっ:
You're a child of Orphea now!
Now get inside this door!
Come on!

3776.「ど……どうして？ 団長さん！: Wh-why are you doing this, Captain?!

3777.「団長さん あんなに 優しかったのに……。\n いつも おいしいケーキ焼いてくれ:
You were always so nice to me...
And you always baked me delicious cakes...
Why are you doing such a terrible thing?!

3782.「開けて！ 開けてよーっ！！: Open the door! LET US OUT!!

3783.「うぇーん！！ 帰して！ おうち 帰して！！: YEAH!! Let me go! I wanna go home!!

3784.「……アルウェ。これで いいんだな？: ...Alwe. Is this really the right thing to do?

3787.「いや いい……。なにも言うな。\n おめえの種族を 俺が 当ててやろう。:
Sorry, it's nothing... Now, don't say a word.
I'll guess which race you are.

3788.「おめえは プクリポの……\n 演芸チャンピオン……そうだな？:
You're a Pukulipo...the Goofball Grand Prix
champion...right?

3791.「俺の種族当ては 百発百中だが……\n 今日ほど 当たって うれしかったことはね:
You know, I've always been pretty good at
guessing races. I've never been as happy to
get it right as I am today.

3792.「ついでに もうひとつ 当ててやろう。\n おめえは オルフェアの町から\n 俺:
And while we're at it, let me stake another
guess. You chased me out of Orphea. Isn't that
right?

3793.「ガキどもは あの扉の中に 閉じ込めた。\n 今は 絶対に 開かないぜ。:
I locked the kids behind that door.
They'll never open it now.

3794.「なにしろ……開くべき運命の時にのみ開く\n 不思議な扉だ……って\n 死んだ妹:
After all...it's a mysterious door that only
opens at the destined hour. Or at least,
that's what my late sister told me.

3795.「……じゃあな 演芸チャンピオン。\n あんたが 俺の思ったとおりのヤツなら\n:
...See ya, Goofball champion.
If you're who I think you are, I'll be seeing
you again soon in Orphea.

3796.「……じゃあな <pc_race>の 旅の人。\n あんたが 俺の思ったとおりの:
...See ya, <pc_race> traveler.
If you're who I think you are, I'll be seeing
you again soon in Orphea.

3798.「どうだった？ 銀の丘で\n ナブレット団長には 会えたかい？:
How'd it go?
Did you meet Captain Nablette on Silver Hill?

3799.「……なんだって？\n 団長が こっちに戻ってこなかったかだと？:
...What's that?
You're wondering if the Captain's returned?

3800.「いや……。今のところ サーカステントには\n ナブレット団長は 戻ってきていな:
Sadly, no...
He hasn't come back to the circus tent yet...
Why, did something happen?

3802.「ナブレット団長が\n 銀の丘の 不思議な扉の中に\n プディンや 子供たちを閉:
Captain Nablette has locked Pudin and all the
other children behind a mysterious door in
Silver Hill?!

3803.「ね ねえ……団長は\n いったい 何をしようとしているの？:
H-hey...
Just what is the Captain trying to do?

3805.「団長が なんのために そんなことをしたのか\n オレたちには わからないが\n:
We may not know why he did it...but this much
is clear.

3806.「オレたちは 何があっても 団長を信じる。:
We have to do whatever it takes to protect
him.

3808.「空が！ 不気味な色に！！: The sky's turned all dark and spooky!!

3812.<center>約束の １５年目だぞ アルウェ！！\nこの悪魔ザイガスとの契約\:
It's the fifteenth year since the promise,
Alwe! Don't tell me you've forgotten the
contract you made with the great Duke Sigras!!

3813.「さあ！ オルフェアの子供らの命！:
Now, give me the lives of every child in
Orphea!

3816.「魔物よ！ 魔物が 町の中に！！: A monster! There's a monster in town!

3817.「き 貴様ーっ！！\n 町内侵入罪で タイホするのであるっ！！:
Y-YOU FIEND!!
I hereby charge you with trespassing in our
town!!

3818.「……と思ったが 今日は 機嫌がいいので\n 特別に 見逃してやるのである！！:
...Is what I would normally say!
But I'm in a good mood today, so I'll turn a
blind eye just this once!!

3822.「この町には 子供など\n ひとりも いないではないかっ！！: There's not a single kid in this town!

3823.「……おどろいたぜ。\n 何もかも アルウェの言ったとおりじゃねえか。:
...What a surprise.
Everything's exactly as Alwe said.

3824.「誰だ！？\n 隠れてないで 出てこい！！: Who's there? Stop hiding and show yourself!!

3825.「クックックック……。\n そう あわてなさんなよ。悪魔のダンナ。:
Keheheheh...
Don't be so hasty, my dear anathema.

3827.「このオルフェアの町長にして\n ナブナブ大サーカス団長の ナブレット様が\n:
...have been kidnapped by the mayor of Orphea,
the leader of the Grand Nab-Nab Circus: moi!!

3828.「さあ！ オルフェアのガキどもの命\n とれるモンなら とってみやがれいっ！:
Come on, what're you waiting for?!
Go ahead and kill them, if you can!

3830.「ゆるさんぞ！！ 契約どおり\n 子供を よこせええっ！！:
I won't let you get away with this!!
Give me the kids like we agreed!!

3831.「へへっ 悪魔のダンナ！\n ちっとも 当たりませんねえ～！:
Heheh! Say, what's wrong, Mr. Demon?!
You haven't landed a single blow～！

3832.「おのれぇ……おのれえええ！！\n 貴様っ！ ゆるさんぞおお！！！:
YOU...YOU LITTLE RUNT!! YOU SCUM!
I WON'T LET YOU GET AWAY WITH THIS!!!

3833.「ガキどもの居所が 知りたきゃあ……: If you wanna know where those kids are...

3834.「俺を 捕まえてみなっ！！: You'll have to catch me first!!

3835.「俺が アイツを 西にある\n ミュルエルの森まで おびき出す。: I'll draw him west to Muruel Forest.

3836.「オルフェアの町を守るため 手を貸してくれ！\n ミュルエルの森の フォステイル:
I need your help to defend Orphea!
We'll take him down in Fostail Square!!

3837.「倒せたら キーエンブレムをくれてやる！\n 信じてるぜっ！\n 演芸チャンピオ:
If you beat him, I'll give you the Key Emblem!
I believe in you, Goofball champion!!

3838.「倒せたら キーエンブレムをくれてやる！\n 信じてるぜっ！\n <pc_rac:
If you beat him, I'll give you the Key Emblem!
I believe in you, <pc_race> traveler!!

3839.「さあ！ こっちだぜ！！ 悪魔のダンナ！: Come on! I'm right here, Mr. Demon!!

3840.「こーこまーで おいで♪\n 悪魔さーん こーちらっと♪:
Over heeeeeere!♪
Right this way, Mr. Demon!♪

3842.「貴様！ オルフェアの子供たちを\n どこに隠したのだっ！？:
You! Where have you hidden the children of
Orphea?!

3843.「悪魔のダンナよ。\n そいつを知りたきゃあ……:
Well, Mr. Demon, if you wanna find that out,
then...

3844.「この俺を 倒してみるんだな！: You'll have to beat me first!

3846.「おろか者め！！\n この森ごと 焼きはらってくれるわあっ！！:
You fools!!
I'll burn this whole forest to the ground!!

3847.「どういうことだ……？: What is the meaning of this...?

3848.「これっぽっちしか 炎が 出ないだと……！？: Why are my flames so weak...?!

3849.「へっ！ クチほどにもねえなぁ 悪魔のダンナ。\n そんなんじゃ ケーキだって:
Heh! Try living up to your own hype next time,
Mr. Demon. Those flames aren't even hot enough
to bake a cake!

3852.「ゆるしてもらえなくて けっこうさ！: As if I'd ever need YOUR forgiveness!

3859.「まさか この ちっぽけな像のせいで\n チカラが 出ないのかっ！？:
Don't tell me that puny statue is the reason
why I can't use my powers?!

3861.「今だ！！ ヤツを 倒すんだ！！: Now's your chance!! Take him down!!

3863.「その いまいましい像に\n チカラを おさえられたところで\n 貴様らを始末す:
Even with that accursed statue draining my
powers, I can still mop the floor with you!!

3864.「来い！ 相手をしてやるぞおっ！！\n あっはっはっはっはあっ！:
Come! I'll put you both down!!
AHAHAHAHAAAAAA!

3865.「おめえなら ヤツを倒せるはずだ！\n 今度こそ頼んだぜ！: I know you can beat him! I'm counting on you!

3867.「おのれ……いまいましき プクリポよ……。\n ……やはり…１５年前……\n 子:
You...accursed Pukulipo...
...I should have...eaten the kids...fifteen
years ago...when I had the chance......

3868.「……助かったぜ 演芸チャンピオンさんよ。\n ありがてえ ありがてえ。:
...You're a lifesaver, Goofball champion.
Thank you.

3869.「そういや まだ名前を 聞いてなかったな。\n ……へえ。そうかい。\n <cs:
Come to think of it, I never caught your name.
...Mmhmm. So your name's <cs_pchero>,
huh?

3870.「って じゃあ おめえが プディンの恩人か！？\n いやはや。こりゃまた 世話に:
What, you're the one who helped Pudin, too?!
Well, well. That's twice I owe you now.
Sorry I've been such a pain.

3871.「……助かったぜ <cs_pchero_race>の 旅人さんよ。\n ありがて:
...You're a lifesaver, <cs_pchero_race> traveler.
I can't thank you enough.

3872.「そういや まだ名前を 聞いてなかったな。\n ……へえ。そうかい。\n <cs:
Come to think of it, I never caught your name.
...Mmhmm. So your name's <cs_pchero>,
huh?

3873.「……オルフェアの町で 何が起きたのか\n おめえには まだ ちゃんと\n 説明:
...I still haven't properly explained to you
what happened in Orphea all those years ago.

3874.「こいつぁ……俺の妹の 遺言なのさ。: This was all...my sister's dying will.

3875.「……俺にゃあ アルウェってえ\n 年の離れた 妹がいてな。: ...I have a little sister named Alwe.

3876.「何年も前に 死んじまったんだが \n たいそうな器量よしで\n 性格も ほがら:
She passed away years ago, but she was a good
person with a gentle heart.

3877.「あいつぁ ガキの頃から おかしなヤツでよ。\n 先のことが なんでも わかっち:
Even as a kid, she was always kind of an
oddball. She had this mysterious power to
know things that would happen in the future.

3880.「俺は 根っからのケーキ職人だ。\n サーカス団なんか やれっこねえよ！！:
"Baking cakes is what I live for.
I can't handle a circus troupe!"

3882.「アルウェね わかるんだもん。\n １５年後にね 銀の丘に来る\n 演芸チャンピ:
"Your little sis has it all figured out."
"The Goofball Grand Prix champion who comes to Silver Hill in fifteen years will be really, really strong!"

3883.「アルウェね わかるんだもん。\n １５年後にね 銀の丘に来る\n <cs_pc:
"Your little sis has it all figured out. The
<cs_pchero_race> traveler who comes to Silver Hill in
fifteen years will be really, really strong!"

3884.「うんとぉ 見た目は あんまり強そうじゃないし\n 髪型とか イマイチだけど\n:
"Granted, they won't look all that tough, and
their hair won't be the best. But they'll be a
good person, and strong, too."

3885.「その人だったら 悪魔ザイガスだって\n 倒せちゃうかもなんだもん！:
"They might even be able to defeat Duke
Sigras!"

3886.「……まあ。おめえの予言は 一度だって\n ハズれたことが ねえけどよ。:
"...Well, your predictions have never been
wrong before."

3887.「だから お兄ちゃん お願いね。\n お兄ちゃんは サーカス団を始めて！:
"So please, big bro!
You have to start your own circus troupe!"

3888.「ケーキ屋さんより サーカスのほうが\n 一度に いっぱい 子供が集まるでしょ？:
"A circus would attract more kids at once than
a cake shop would, right?
So it definitely has to be a circus!"

3890.「お兄ちゃんは サーカス団を始めるの！: "Yay! You're gonna start a circus troupe!"

3891.「それで １５年経ったら\n オルフェアの子供を みーんな さらってね。\n １:
"So remember, after fifteen years, you have to
kidnap every kid in Orphea. You'll get help
from a traveler who arrives that same year."

3894.「このフォステイル広場に おびきだせば\n １５年目に現れる旅人が 悪魔のヤロウ:
My sister believed that if I lured him here to
Fostail Square, a traveler would appear on the
fifteenth year to defeat him.

3895.「ここは プクリポにとって聖なる場所だから\n ……ってな。:
Since this is a sacred place for us Pukulipo.
...That's what she told me.

3897.「……おっと。こうしちゃ いられねえ。\n くわしい話は 後回しだ。\n 銀の丘:
...Whoops, what am I thinking? I'll go over
the details later. Right now, I need to go to
Silver Hill to get those kids out!!

3898.「悪かったなあ ガキども。\n もう だいじょうぶだ。\n そこから 出てきてい:
My bad, kiddos.
Everything's alright now.
You can come out!!

3900.「もう なんにもしねえよ。\n ほらほら。おうちに帰りたいんだろ？:
I'm not gonna try anything.
Come on, you wanna go home, right?

3902.「団長さん……。\n ぼく 団長さんのこと 信じてたよ！:
Captain...
I never stopped believing in you!

3903.「よせやい。ケツが かゆくなるぜ。\n ほれっ さっさと出てこい！:
Cut it out. You'll do Sigras's job for him if
I die from embarrassment. Go on, get moving!

3905.「言ったろ？ この扉は\n 開くべき運命の時だけ 開く……って。:
I told you, didn't I?
This door only opens when it's destined to.
She taught me that.

3906.「<pc>。おめえが 悪魔ザイガスを\n 倒してくれたから こうして 扉は開き\:
You defeated Duke Sigras, so now the door is
open and all the kids can go home.

3907.「ありがとよっ <pc>。\n 礼を 言わせてもらうぜ！:
Thanks, <pc>.
Let me show you my appreciation!

3908.「えへへ……また <pc>さんに\n 助けてもらっちゃったね。\n やっぱり チ:
Ehehe... Looks like you helped me yet again,
<pc>! Goofball Grand Prix champions
really are the coolest!

3911.「どうして オルフェアの町の子供を\n 悪魔は 食べようとしたの？:
Why'd that demon want to eat all of Orphea's
children in the first place?

3913.「そうさなあ……。\n おめえらに ひとつ 昔話をしてやろう。: Right... Let me tell you an old story.

3914.「むかーし むかしの お話さね……。:
I guess you could think of it as a fairy
tale...

3915.<center>むかし むかし……といっても\n１５年ほど 前のこと……。\nオ:
Once upon a time...
About fifteen years ago...
There was a girl who lived in Orphea.

3916.<center>娘には 生まれつき 未来のことがわかる\n不思議なチカラが あり:
She was born with the uncanny ability to see
the future.

3917.<center>ある日……娘は どうしても\n銀の丘へ 行かなければならないと\:
One day...she had this strange feeling that
she had to go to Silver Hill.

3918.「ほんとに ヘンな扉 あるし～！？: "So there really IS a weird door here?!"

3919.「予知っ娘☆アルウェちゃんも\n こんな ヘンなのが ほんとにあるなんて\n さ:
"Even I, the prettiest prophet Alwe, am
surprised to learn that something this
peculiar truly exists..."

3920.「えーとお こんにちはぁ？\n よばれて とびでた アルウェですうー。:
"Umm, hello?
You called for me, so here I am."

3921.<center>銀の丘に現れた 不思議な扉の中で\n娘は フォステイルという プ:
From that mysterious door on Silver Hill, she
received a notebook from a Pukulipo named
Fostail which could make any wish come true.

3922.<center>ノートに書ける 願いごとは ３つ。\nただし……３つめの願いを:
"You may write three wishes in this notebook.
However...when the third wish is written, the
one who wrote it shall die..."

3925.「えーとお……そっか！\n ためしてみちゃえば いいんだーっ。\n アルウェちゃ:
"Hmm...I see!
Then I'll just have to try it out!
You're so smart, Alwe!"

3926.「ノートさん ノートさん。おねがーいっ！: "Mr. Notebook, Mr. Notebook. Here's my wish!"

3927.「あたし アルウェちゃんはあ \n 本物のお姫様に なりたいでーすっ。: "Make me into a real life princess."

3928.<center>娘の願いは かないました。\n次の日 メギストリスのお城から 使:
Her wish was granted. The very next day, a messenger arrived from Megistris castle to inform her that the king wished to make her
his queen.

3929.<center>それから娘は メギストリス王妃として\nしあわせな日々を 送って:
And so, she lived happily ever after as the
queen of Megistris.

3931.「お前は 予知のチカラを持つ娘……\n アルウェに まちがいないな……？:
"You're that girl with the gift of prophecy
called...Alwe, right...?"

3934.「あたしはぁ もう お姫様なんだから！ \n アルウェ王妃ちゃん様って 呼びなさ:
"I'm a queen now!
So you have to call me 'Her Esteemed Highness,
the Lovable Super-Cutie Queen Alwe'."

3935.「ふざけるなっ！\n 頭から バリバリ 食ってやるぞ！！: "AS IF! I'LL EAT YOU FROM THE HEAD DOWN!!"

3936.「やーん。こっわーいっ！\n 怒ったー 怒ったー！！: "Eep, I'm so scared～! So angry, so angry!!"

3939.「ちっちっち！\n かわいい アルウェ王妃ちゃん様 だもーん。:
"Tsk tsk!
That's 'Her Esteemed Highness, the Lovable
Super-Cutie Queen Alwe'."

3940.「貴様は かわいい\n アルウェ王妃ちゃん……様？ に\n まちがいないな？:
"You're Her Esteemed Highness, the...Lovable
Super-Cutie Queen Alwe. Is that correct?"

3942.「……この大陸の どこかに……\n プクリポの救世主が 生まれているはず……。:
"...Somewhere on this continent...a savior of
the Pukulipo will be born..."

3943.「そいつの居所を 予知してもらおう……。: "I need you to predict his whereabouts..."

3945.「アルウェ そういうの 予知したくなあい！: "I don't wanna predict something like that!"

3946.「予知しないのなら それでもよい……。: "If you won't foresee it, then that's fine..."

3947.「お前を殺し！ プクリポの子供たちを\n かたっぱしから 喰らってやるまでよ！！:
"I'll just kill you then!
And I'll eat every last one of those Pukulipo
children!!"

3950.「おそろしいかぁ！？ おそろしいだろう！\n ならば 言うことを聞け！！:
"Scared, are you?! As you should be!
Now listen!!"

3951.「プクリポの救世主の居所を\n 私のために 予知するのだっ！！:
"Foresee the whereabouts of the Pukulipo
savior for me!"

3952.<center>娘は 世界に おそるべき災いが\n迫っていることを 悟りました…:
It was then that she realized that a terrible
disaster was brewing...

3953.<center>そして 娘は 不思議なチカラで\nいまだ プクランド大陸には 救:
And with her mysterious power, she also knew
that the savior had yet to be born into
Pukuland...

3956.「なんだとぉ！？\n いいかげんなことを言うと 承知せんぞ！:
"What's that?!
You'd best not be lying right now!"

3959.「でも もうすぐ……\n これから １５年の間に\n オルフェアのどこかで 生ま:
"But they will be soon...somewhere in Orphea,
fifteen years from now..."

3960.「ほらあ！ 予知してあげたわよおっ！\n 今度は あたしの言うこと 聞きなさい！:
"Well, there! I predicted it for you!
Now listen up!"

3963.「１５年よ。１５年間 ぜったいに\n オルフェアの子には 手を出しちゃダメ！！:
"Fifteen years! For fifteen years, you must
not harm the children of Orphea!!"

3964.「１５年経ったら オルフェアの子を\n 全員 食べちゃえばいいわ！！\n でも:
"In fifteen years, you can eat them all!!
But until then..."

3965.「ぜったいの ぜったい ダメなのっ！！: "You absolutely cannot lay a hand on them!!"

3967.「たった１５年ぽっち 待てばよいのだな？\n 悪魔にとっては ほんの ひと眠りよ:
"I only have to wait fifteen years?
For a demon, that's like a quick nap."

3968.「よかろう。お前と 契約を交わしてやろう。\n これから１５年の間は オルフェア:
"Very well. It's a deal.
For the next fifteen years, I won't lay a hand
on the children of Orphea."

3969.「ただし……１５年後の 今日になったら\n 好きにさせてもらうぞ……。:
"However... When fifteen years finally pass, I
intend to do as I please..."

3970.「１５年後の今日 オルフェア中の子供を\n 皆殺しにし……\n 救世主を 始末し:
"Fifteen years from today, I'll kill every kid
in Orphea...and get rid of that savior!"

3972.「予知のほうびに お前は いずれ\n 苦しまぬよう 殺してやろう！！:
"As a reward for your prediction, I'll kill
you so you won't have to suffer!!"

3976.「でも……１５年後には……いるの。\n １５年後に 救世主くんがいるのは\n あ:
"But...fifteen years from now...I'm certain
that he will appear."

3977.「アルウェのヤツが オルフェアに里帰りして \n ひとり息子の ラグアス王子を:
A year later, Alwe returned home to Orphea and
gave birth to her only son, Prince Raguas.

3978.「悪魔なんざと 契約したせいなのか…… \n ほんとのトコは わからねえが アル:
I don't know if it's because she made a deal
with a devil or what, but...after that, Alwe
died a terrible death.

3979.「住んでた家 もろとも……\n ひと晩で ミイラみてえに ひからびて\n 死んじ:
I'm told that one night, in her own home...she
shriveled up like a mummy and perished.

3980.「じ……じゃあ もしかして\n アルウェさんは ノートに\n ３つめの願いを 書:
Th...then did she write a third wish in the
notebook?!

3981.「さあなあ……。俺には わからねえ。\n でも これだけは 確かよ。:
I don't know...
But there's one thing I'm sure of.

3982.「アルウェは オルフェアのガキどもを\n 悪魔から守るため １５年後の今日\n:
Alwe asked me to kidnap every child in Orphea
today, fifteen years later, to protect them
from that demon.

3983.「子供さえ 隠しておきゃあ\n 演芸チャンピオンの 強～い旅人さんが\n 悪魔ザ:
As long as you were all kept hidden, a strong traveler, a Goofball Grand Prix champion, would defeat Duke Sigras...
That's what she told me.

3984.「子供さえ 隠しておきゃあ\n <pc_race>の 強～い旅人さんが\n 悪魔:
As long as you were all kept hidden, a strong
<pc_race> traveler would defeat Duke Sigras...
That's what she told me.

3985.「おおっと。ついつい 長話になっちまったぜ。:
Whoops, my bad.
That ended up being a really long story.

3986.「本当に すまなかったなあ <pc>。\n おめえには 礼をしたいから\n 後で:
Sorry 'bout that, really. Hey, come back to
the circus tent later so I can thank you,
okay? I promise!

3987.「おお～い！ ガキども～！！\n オルフェアの町へ 帰るぞ～！！:
Alright, kiddos!
We're headed back to Orphea!!

3988.「ここかぁ～！！！\n 悪漢ナブレットの アジトはっ！？:
Could this be it?!
That ne'er-do-well Nablette's hideout!!!

3989.「うぬう。かような場所に 不似合いな\n いかにも アヤシイ扉を発見……！！:
Hmph. A door that looks suspiciously out of
place...!!

3990.「悪漢ナブレットめっ！！\n 神妙に お縄に かかれいっ！:
Nablette, you knave!!
To the gallows with you!

3992.「あっ 開けてくれぇ～い！！\n 誰か～！ 助けてえ～っ！！！！: Hey, open up!! Someone! HELP MEEEEEEE!!!!

3993.「レディース エンド ジェントルメン！\n エーンド オルフェアの チルドレン！:
Ladies and gentlemen!
Children of Orphea!
And...

3995.「この方こそが オルフェアの子供たちを\n 魔物の手から守った 英雄です！！\n:
This is the hero who rescued Orphea's children
from the demon's clutches!
Let's have a big round of applause!

3999.「皆さまに まずは おわびを\n 申し上げねば なりません。:
Before anything else, I need to apologize to
you all.

4000.「魔物から 隠すためとはいえ\n オルフェアの子供たちを さらい\n 閉じ込めた:
Even if it was to hide them from a monster,
that doesn't change the fact that I kidnapped
every child in Orphea.

4002.「皆さまを お騒がせした\n おわびとして……\n 当 ナブナブ大サーカス団は…:
As an apology for the trouble I've caused...as
of today, the Grand Nab-Nab Circus is...

4003.「本日をもちまして 解散！！\n 私も 町長の座をしりぞき\n このオルフェアか:
Permanently disbanded!!
In addition, I will be stepping down as mayor
and leaving Orphea!

4007.「ぼく さらわれたときは\n 本当に 本当に こわかったけど……:
When I was kidnapped, it was really, really
scary, but...

4008.「でも おじちゃんが さらってくれなかったら\n ぼくたち 魔物に食べられてたん:
If you hadn't done that, we would all have
been eaten by that monster...
You didn't do anything wrong!

4010.「弟のくせに ぼくが言いたかったこと\n 先に言うなよ！！:
You're the younger brother, remember?
Don't go stealing my line!!

4012.「そうよ！ ナブレットさんが\n さらってくれなかったら\n みんな 死んじゃっ:
That's right! If Mr. Nablette hadn't taken us,
we'd all be dead!

4013.「ナブレットさんは いいことをしたのよ！\n だから……:
You did the right thing, Nablette!
So...

4018.「また ナブナブ大サーカスが 観たいの！\n お願いっ ナブレットさん！！:
I want to see the Grand Nab-Nab Circus again!
Please, Mr. Nablette!

4021.「ガキどもに あんな ひでえことをした\n この俺だってのに……。: Even though I did such an awful thing, you...

4023.「オルフェアの町の衆と 子供たちに\n そこまで言われちゃあ\n サーカスをやめ:
If you all feel that way, then I won't disband
the circus!

4025.「新生ナブナブ大サーカス団の\n すてきな サーカスを\n 心ゆくまで お楽しみ:
Please enjoy the New Grand Nab-Nab Circus to
your heart's content!!

4028.「君の勇気をたたえ 新生ナブナブ大サーカス団の\n アクロバットケーキ 第１号を:
In honor of your bravery, we're giving you the
very first Acrobatic Cake of the New Grand
Nab-Nab Circus!!

4031.なんと ケーキの中から\n白のキーエンブレムが 出てきた！:
To your surprise, a White Key Emblem emerged
from the cake!

4032.<pc>は\n白のキーエンブレム（だいじなもの）を\n受け取った！<me 72>:
<pc> received
the White Key Emblem (Key Item)!<me 72>

4033.「皆さん！ オルフェアを救った 英雄！！\n <pc>に 今一度 盛大な拍手をー:
Ladies and gentlemen!
Let's have one more big round of applause for
the hero who saved Orphea!!

130559.「オルフェアの町の名物といったら\n やっぱり ナブナブ大サーカスだよ。\n 今:
The Grand Nab-Nab Circus is the most famous
event in all of Orphea. And I heard that this
time, it's going to be especially amazing.

130560.「特別公演だから オルフェアの住人か\n まあ 一人前の証を持ってるヤツなら\n:
It's a special performance for the citizens of
Orphea, but if you have a Mark of Maturity,
they may let you in.

130561.「もし 一人前の証を持ってるんなら\n サーカステントに 行ってみるといい。\n:
If you have a Mark, you should go to the
circus tent. It's that fancy tent up there at
the top of the hill.
